subject: Evil people!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Well, thanks to those vitriolic attatcks by jody and friends, and of 
course my own stupidity in keep the arguements going, I'll have 
curtail my group, and e-mail activity, since that ignorant goaded me 
into arguements saved all my e-mails, and forwarded them to my boss. I 
was too stubborn, and keep firing back insults to match her insults.  

 So if if anyonme else gets these personal attacks from the debunker, 
best to to ignopre it. 


 Frank
